sentences: During morning and afternoon informal discussions, parties reached agreement on a number of sections in the Co-Chairs draft decision text.
Working in a small group, parties agreed that the Fund should comprise a Board, a secretariat and a trustee.
Agreement was also reached on most of the functions of the Board and the chair.
On Saturday evening, outstanding issues were under consideration by representatives from two groups of negotiators.
Agreement has yet to be reached on the nature of representation on the Board, and on the secretariat and trustee.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
